Title: Troll Hunter
Overview: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.
Tagline: You’ll believe it when you see it!
production_companies: Filmkameratene A/S, Film Fund FUZZ, SF Norge A/S
Cast: Otto Jespersen, Hans Morten Hansen, Tomas Alf Larsen
clean_text: troll hunter group student investigate series mysterious bear killing learn dangerous thing go start follow mysterious hunter learn actually troll hunter believe fantasy horror andré øvredal otto jespersen hans morten hansen tomas alf larsen 2010
